Package info.jonclark.treegraft.core.tokens

Token abstractions that separate the notion of tokens from Strings.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Token Abstracts Terminal tokens away from Strings so that we can use more efficient representations such as integers for storing them in memory and doing comparisons while still retaining the ability to use String for ease of debugging.
 

Class Summary
TokenFactory<T extends Token> Responsible for mapping input strings to unique tokens so that they can be efficiently compared and hashed.
 

Package info.jonclark.treegraft.core.tokens Description

Token abstractions that separate the notion of tokens from Strings. This allows for quick comparisons without doing character-by-character matching and for storing meta-data such as terminal vs non-terminal information and performing factored MT.
